author: mratsim
content:
I've drafted a binary format for trusted setups, available here:

- https://github.com/mratsim/constantine/blob/master/constantine/trusted_setups/README.md

cc <@592004585506340885> , <@427491045308235776> , <@203220829473996800> , <@415109946682769408> 

The goal is to standardize something usable from any language instead of having a specific version for C:
- https://github.com/ethereum/c-kzg-4844/blob/main/src/trusted_setup.txt
Or the spec version that requires json.
